mapper.select: SELECT c.idColaborador, c.nombre, c.apellidoPaterno, c.apellidoMaterno, c.CURP, c.correo, c.noPersonal, c.contrasenia, c.fotografia, c.idRol, c.idSucursal, d.numero_licencia AS numeroLicencia FROM COLABORADOR c INNER JOIN CONDUCTOR d ON c.idColaborador = d.idConductor WHERE c.noPersonal = #{noPersonal} AND c.contrasenia = #{password}
